dependencies.description:
This library provides two very simple decorators that document the
publicness of the names in your module.
dependencies.name: py-atpublic

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.
dependencies.name: py-psutil

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).
dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.
dependent_to.name: py-dvc

description: NFS-safe file locking with timeouts for POSIX and Windows
name: py-flufl-lock
